title: Dr. Jeffrey Thompson - Breathe (Alpha Relaxation Solution) FLAC
description:
Dr. Jeffrey Thompson is a pioneering sound healer who has innovated techniques for embedding Alpha Brainwave Pulses into soothing musical soundtracks. Alpha waves are the brainwaves that people naturally produce in states of deep relaxation. As you listen to these CDs, your own brainwaves naturally lock onto the Alpha pulses and carry you to states of deep calm, inner peace, and rejuvenating relaxation. 

For this unique collaboration Dr. Thompson has combined his clinically proven audio processes with the lush and tranquil musical works of world renowned sound healer Jorge Alfano. 

Jorge Alfano is an inspired musician, producer, and sound healer who has played with artists such as Astor Piazzolla, Richie Havens, Peter Erskine, Paul Horn, Steven Halpern, and many others. This meditative multi-instrumental soundtrack weaves together the soothing sounds of piano, flutes, strings, fretless bass, and percussion. Breathe deeply as you are led to a place of quiet balance and serenity. 

01 Mountain Rain 15.14 
02 Healing Waters of Thailand 13.33 
03 Fire Dance 15.04 
04 Indian Summer 15.18
